text:
"Abe lab ke liye 2 min bache hai" - Me
"Haan abhi bas mess me lunch karke aata hu" - An always late guy

The above summarizes the life of the legendary Ali Faraz. Never done anything before time, though panic struck him weeks before any submission. 
The most spiritual guy I ever met, thinks of a spiritual viewpoint in every decision.
Makes life tough for labmates on regular basis, but has a weird power of making one forget that with a big smile just fitting right in his small face.
"Electrical kar rahe hai to core me jaenge" - Ali
A very humble friend, with whole you can discuss about the meaning of life etc, and come back with even more question than you started with, just enough for you to leave the topic and continue your life as usual.

On a serious note, Thanks ali for supporting and advicing me in important decisions. And all the best for your future endeavours.
author: Aniket  Sharma

text:
My first friend in IITK... Orientation me baithe the audi me, left me dekho to 4 aur aniket milte the, left me dekho to 1 animesh (beech wale ki height hi bohot kam thi xd), to maine socha apni aniket wali prajati ke alag wale se milte hai... thus began our friendship. Yaad hai saath me repi bane aur pehli GBM skip karke movie dekhne gaye the ğŸ¤£. Sem ke pehle movie ka record chalu hua tha tak, ye bc corona na hota to tere sath 8 sems movie ka record banata ğŸ˜”.... Tu hi mari inspiration tha meri pehli wing chodne ki, ye dikhane ki, ki bohot kuch hai IIT me but with the right set of friends, thanks uske liye, Baki saale tune to aisa lagta hai rule banaya hua tha, ki jis din aniket busy hoga usi din party dunga mai ğŸ™„. Chal tab bhi thanks for the last party, really enjoyed it ğŸ˜‹... Tu hamesha yaad rahega as a friend who is there with his mates on the difficult times to support, and to use them as joke material for the remainder of the time ğŸ˜†.
Thanks for making my IITK experience wonderful and giving the journey the important turns it needed. Wish you all the best for your future endeavours.
author: Aniket  Sharma

text:
The perfect boyfriend material... but sadly arrange marriage hi karga.. srry ladiesğŸ¤£.
Ankit bhai apna ek number guitarist aur singer bhi hai, "_____ ka dil jis dil pe fida hai" ğŸ˜œ
Raat ko wrestling ka bhoot bhi chad jata hai inhe

"Bhai teri cycle ke brakes kharab hai, mera accident hone wala tha"
"Haa bro, pair se brake marta hu, kasrat ho jati hai + muscles ban jati hai"
Kaha se itne gyan late ho prabhu ğŸ™„.
Baki sports me to chaapu hai hi tu, Basketball me to number 1.
Par yaar jab bhi kahi chalne ko bolo tab tumhe padhai yaad aa jati hai 'What is this behaviour ankit?' ğŸ˜‚.
Anatragni me log girlfriends ke sath rehte hai, mai tumhare sath har baar phus jata tha ğŸ¤, par maza bohot kiya tha sari antaragni me sath.

Thanks for always being there with me.
All the best for all future endeavours throughout your life.
PS: Paintball ka badla abhi bhi baki hai vo leke rahunga.
author: Aniket  Sharma

text:
Yo fifa guy... "Bhai tu to Rs 800/ hour kamata hai canteen/mama mio ki party teri" keh ke shaam ka intezam ho jata tha ğŸ˜›. FIFA me kitne sare matches khele sath me, tu hi sahi tha (barabri ka), dhakate aur mukesh to g maar ke chale jate the. Movies kitni dekhne gaye the kambakt corona se pehle ğŸ˜¥.... Tere personality bohot sahi hai bro, par tab bhi ladkiyo ke naam pe underconfident ho jata hai, ye aadat bi hum jaiso ke sath rehkar sekh liğŸ¤£.  Last ke 2 mahino se pehle kyu nahi milta tha, shreyas aur triptesh ke sath us band darwaze me kya chalta tha aaj bhi mystery hai ğŸ¤”ğŸ¤£.
Chalo, thank you for making my college life, especially the last 2 months so much memorable, and all the best for all the paths in your life.
author: Aniket  Sharma

text:
"Ayush shrotriya kon hai?" - Question in HAB selection interview
"Acting cult secretary" - answer from a very educated and prepared Y18
"Selected" - Sahil Khan

Ahh... the acting cult secy... Bhai kab karani hai game night, aaj tak mai invitation ka intezar kar raha hu ğŸ˜¥.  tum cult secy bane (vo bhi acting) to hall ka culture hi chud gaya, hab me aae to ab hab hi nahi hai, galaxy me captain bane to galaxy scrap ho gayi... bhai tum chahte kya ho, mana ki tumhe child labor karwake IIT nikalwaya, par hum logo se kya dushmaniğŸ˜¬.
Anyways, one of the chillest guys, who comes first to give 'so called advice' to anyone on any problem in the universe, par khud pe aati hai gaa*d phat ke haath me aa jati thi, hall captain banne me hi ran*i rona shuru ğŸ¤£.
Anyways, Thanks for making my IITK experience such a happening one, even after being an acting. All the best for your future and stop worrying too much.
author: Aniket  Sharma

text:
Are Bhaiya aap to vahi piyush patel ke vlog wale ho na.... big fan
Saale fake foreigner, mera memoir kab likhega be
"Aaja chai pene chalte hai" - the most common line heard from you, par bc nayi canteen khulwane ka thanks kabhi nahi bola tune.
Kher, ye bata ab kisko prank call karge apni agli fake call me ğŸ˜›. Jo bhi ho tum entertainment to khoob acha provide karte ho.
Bas aise hi bane rehna, change mat karna apne aap ko, including your contrast ğŸ¤£.
Lucky to be your friend Simon, now go back.
Best of luck for your future endeavours
author: Aniket  Sharma

text:
Allrounder, Chaapu,
will get out of any situation easily,
will never teach you any of his skills
pretends to be too humble to the extend that make even god look selfish
My last friend that stayed with me till the end of IITK - Love you 3000.
"Party dega?" - "Depends on your gender"
"ye game khelega, nayi hai" - after 3 hours - "kuch naya lao yaar jeete hue boar ho gaya"
All the best for all the future endeavours.
author: Aniket  Sharma

text:
The chill guy, kabhi tujhe tension me nahi dekha, haweli se sekh ke aaya kya tension me bhi hasna ğŸ˜. Chahe to iske room me kutta ghusa ke band kar do koi reaction hi nahi milega ğŸ˜µ.
Always looking to do crazy things, yaad hai carry ki gaddi ke peche cycle bhagai thi ğŸ¤£.
One of my first friends in the wing after animesh, aaj bhi yaad hai billiards shuru kiya tha.
Jaha party hoti hai vaha prakat ho jata hai (ye kaala jadu bhi sikhado yaar.) and chaapu in every sport, next to jd ofcourse ğŸ˜.
Doesn't know shit about dancing (neither do i), and does so by just flinging his long hands in air, in always the same motion ğŸ¤£
Pura time bolta raha last year ki bas college kholdo dosto se milna hai... aur jab bari aai to hum sub mil rahe the aur tum kahi aur hi bonding karne chal diye ğŸ˜.
Intern ke time jab nahi lag rahi thi meri, to tune hi sabse jayada support kiya tha, cisco ke har round ke baad result puchta tha , thanks a lot uske liye ğŸ˜‡.
Ab to pass hi me hai, aur bengalore me bhi, to milte rahenge. Farewell amigo and all the best till then !!
author: Aniket  Sharma

text:
One of the most witted persons I met. Bro, you dig out insights from things which we are not able to notice. 
Humur bhi bohot tagda hai tera.
And thank you elections me meri class lagane ke liye, bohot kuch sekha tha campaigning karne ke bare me us din.
Photogenic to tera face hai hi, par ye dp alag hi level ki lagai hai ğŸ˜, itne masoom bhi nahi ho ğŸ˜‚
I wish we could share more time together, par agay zarur milenge.
Keep in touch, and all the best.
author: Aniket  Sharma

text:
Are presi, tumhara wing ke last me likh rahe hai, Jitna bolo tumhare bare me kum hai..
Master painter - govt bans p***, ends up drawing huge ___ on his wall. Aane wale sare bed bacche khush ğŸ¤£
Galaxy handler - par scrap karni padi ğŸ˜¶
English expert - bohot compelling mail likhta hai, convener ko dream 11 ki team banane bhej deta hai, tab bhi bc tune mera memoir shudh hindi me likha, ab tak aadha bhi nahi padh paaya.
Bass ek cheez se dar lagta hai, jab tum darwaze pe dastak dekar bolte ho "Areyyy yaarrrr sharma", pata chal jata hai ki some shit has happened and is ready to suck out hours from my day ğŸ˜—.
Par manage bohot badiya kar lete ho tum be it wardens, phatta league, galaxy aur the halls most important issue  - dosa mix grinder ğŸ¤£.
Bohot maza aaya tha bro tere sath kaam karke, bas dosa nahi kha paaye nayi machine se ğŸ˜¥.
2019 ke elections me support karne ke liye aur saare halls me sath me chalne ke liye thanks bro.. mai kabhi nahi bhulunga yo time.
Tu fraudi bhi bohot hai saale, jayada tareefe sunke khush mat ho jana, manifesto ke kaam ke liye jonior ko exploit karta hai.
Aalsi bhi bohot ho gaya tha tu in 2 mahino me, subha 1 ghanta 'so called bhagne' ke baad pura time bed pe leeta rehta tha, ise accha bc badminton hi khelne aa jata ğŸ˜¶.
Anyways, Thanks for being a part of my life.
Aur vo trip jarur maarenge covid kam hote hi.
Baki ab madras me jake elections ki baand bajana.
Farewell Presi
author: Aniket  Sharma

text:
The chillest of the chill guy...mast launda.... Jis cheez me intrest hai use excel kar lega, aur baki cheeze g marae. One of the smartest and handsome person i met, ladies ise cheat mat karna, bohot pachtaoge.
UPSC kaisa chal raha? ya vaha bhi masti maar rahe ğŸ˜‚.
Missed u in the last 2 months, aa jata bro..
you were one of the inspirations for me to enjoy more in the college life.
Thanks for being a part of my college life, aage bhi milte rahenge.
Till then, All the best.
author: Aniket  Sharma

text:
Aur bro, i am sure tune apne society ke baccho ko bhi nukkad sikha diya hoga ab tak to ğŸ˜. yaad hai pehli baar hum freshers night ke drams me mile the, frankly mai to sirf seniors ne force kiya isliye aaya tha, but i didn't knew ki tum chaap doge is field me itna, hech maine to ye bhi nahi socha tha ki 4 mahie baad hum roommates honge ğŸ˜†. Thanks bro sharan dene ke liye ğŸ˜….
Baki chapu to tu hai hi, pura time bulla/drams karne ke baad bhi exam ke kuch ghante pehle padh ke chaap dete tha (how bro how).
Bhai keep in touch, love you too much,
All the best till we meet next.
author: Aniket  Sharma

text:
"Bhai 1 ghante me utha dena"
- 2 hour later and several gpls later still sleeping- "zzzzz"

Bhai alarm clock ka naam suna hai? Ya mera gadda itna pasand tha to directly maang lete.
Dusse marne ki technique kabhi nahi sikhai yaar tumne, chaapuness pass karni chahiye thi.
One of the chillest CSE guy I ever met with "exam prep chut jae par koi party na choote" moto.

All the best bro!
author: Aniket  Sharma

text:
"Bhai MTH101 me A ke bohot kam chance hai" 
-- The line itself describes the journey of this guy. Always showing himself underconfident and ends up overachieving remains his tactic for deception till this day.
Baki kya hi bole ab, hall hamari maa tha, par teri girlfriend thi library, fir kya tha, bad judgement calls and high priority to gf prevented you from meeting us.
Uske baad chala gaya Finland, uske baad aa gaya corona.
Still, you were the guy I always came to whenever got any shitty technical idea, and you would point out flaws in it,.. bohot sapne tode hai tumne mere.ğŸ™„

Thanks for being a part in my life at IITK, and aage bhi so beware.
All the best for all your future endeavours.ğŸ‘
author: Aniket  Sharma

text:
Aur dramatics wale bhaiya, kaise ho ! U are one of the most hardworking people when I think of galaxy or drams, saurabh dubey ki legecy follow karoge ?ğŸ˜.
Shaiyeri bhi bohot sahi sunate ho, aur ab UPSC, itna multitalent kaha se aata hai bhai ğŸ¤”.
Wish I could spend some more time knowing u, but stay in touch. And all the best for future!!
author: Aniket  Sharma

text:
"Bhai apne IITK ke last ke 2 ghante bed pe pada rahega kya"
"Haa"
"Kuch alag nahi karna last baar"
"Naa"
- after 1 hour, the guy is lying down on bed again, but this time in HC with a broken foot ğŸ¤£. Aisi college ka exit style to one in a million tha ğŸ˜‚. PP hota to youtube me 1 million views to ho hi jate.

Anyways, the most chilled guy, but will always refuse to give bithday treat on official birthday ğŸ˜–, ab to zomato me ho gaya hai bro, ab to pizza deliver karwa do ğŸ™„. Belongs to a species that starts studing on the day of the exam and scores well never failing to humiliating you, hume bhi sikha dete yaar, ya atleast SRD ko hi share kar lete, khud hi ke liye book kar liye use tum to ğŸ˜¥. Warning; Doesn't take anything seriously, and will always be seen with a big smile.
Thanks bro for being a part of my IITK journey. And all the best for your future zomato deliveriesğŸ‘.
author: Aniket  Sharma

text:
Memoirs accept nahi kar rahe kya ğŸ˜‚. Chalo tab bhi likh hi deta hu..tum bhi kya yaad rakhoge.
The stud of our wing ğŸ˜. But waste as a wingie, kabhi apne secrets batata tha kisiko bhi. Priyanka wala cake samuhik karne ke liye srry ğŸ˜› but you didn't deserve it too.
Triptesh ke sath bhi dhoka kar diya, ab kya hi bole.
Par Z square bhi bohot gaye the sath me aur ek baar raat ke liye band bhi hone wale the xd
last ke 2 mahine me kyu nahi aaya bc... tera bestfriend(Rajat ghoshal) tujpe cheat karne lag gaya tha mere sath... srry ğŸ˜†.
Thanks for being a part in my college life, and keep in touch.
All the best ab kaise bolu, jab tumne khud hi iit me 1 saal aur ragda khane ka decision liya hai, iske liye to best of luck hi chalega. Chalo bye.
author: Aniket  Sharma

text:
"Papa, ek ladki ka message aaya hai, keh rahi hai 'i love you', kya karu?"
The above describes his way with the girls, stolen may hearts and sadly broken all of them. 'What is this behaviour Soumya?'. 
The most chaapu guy of electrical, bas admit nahi karta hai.
2nd 3rd year me saare doubts tere see hi puchta tha, put batane see pehle modesty ka bhut chad jata tha tujhe
"Bhai chapter x padh liya?"
"Abhi padhna start kar raha hu/ pehle page par hu"
I afraid if there were 2-3 more semesters then this would evolve to - "Bhai abhi pichle semester ke courses pe hi atka hua hu, uske baad chalu karunga" ğŸ˜†.
Very obedient guy, ghar pe batae begair IIT ke bahar nahi jaega, lagta hai gaali dene se pehle bhi permission mangega.
Inter IITK winner, Club codi, ERA, branch change, chaapu cpi.... makes the intervier say -  bhai ye sab ek hi janam ke hai kya??
Many people dont know, but soumya ki fun side bhi hai ğŸ˜. Hum apne aapko dhanya maante hai tumhe vo avtar me dekhke, jo bhi phuk ke vo roop dharan karte ho. Dancing on the bed while wing watches video is still my fav ğŸ¤©.
Keep in touch bro, socha tha bengaluru me milenege, par tum to LABASNA ja rahe, vahi aake milna padega ab.
Thanks for being a part of my college life. And all the best for all of your future endeavours
author: Aniket  Sharma

text:
"___ ka dil jis dil pe fida hai"
"wo dil bewafa hai, bewafa hai"
"Ek ___ hai, Ek ___ hai"

you know the blanks and the rest.
Anyways, bro, yours was my anytime goto room, whenever PP kicked me out for making videos. And no doubt our bond(of friendship to clarify ğŸ¤£) got stronger, so much that half of my belonging would lie in your room. 2nd year wali wrestling yaad hai ğŸ˜›, bohot maze kiye the bhai, wish we could relive those moments.
All the best for your future brother from another mother.
author: Aniket  Sharma

text:
Are tum to wahi ho na jo apni hi company ko ditch kar deta hai aur sochna hai ki har 2 mahine me breakup kyu hojata hai mera ğŸ¥´. Mai to kehta hu industry me kuch nahi rakha, DSLR pakdo apni photo kheencho aur raato raat wildlife photographer ban jao.
Kher, tumhari 2nd year wali orange "ball" (yaad hi hogi ğŸ™ƒ) hall2 me hamare kamre mei hi chod di thi tumne.. i hope this terrible loss doesn't affect your already nullified masculinity (puri daadi bhi nahi uga paaya ğŸ¤¦â€â™‚ï¸).
Ok, ok, enough of body shaming(abhi tak to height pe bhi nahi aaya tha)... ab thodi tareef bhi kar dete hai... jab tu udghosh kara raha tha to tere me management wali skill dekhti thi, and teri personality bhi us time drastically improve hui thi (hume bhi thodi dedo). Par bhai itna bhi naam nahi karna tha ki swayam indra dev Udghosh dekhne aa jaye ğŸ˜†.
Gyan cho*na to koi inse sekhe... hum log to phir bhi gaali de dete the, par bechare y18's ko to ye karna bhi naseeb me nahi tha... phir kya, guptaji bas junior jaha dikha vaha pakad ke baith jaate the 'gyaan' dene.
But it still cant be denied ki mujhe kuch acchi advices bhi tumne hi de thi.. Thank you for those.
Baki stay in touch gupta ji, aap jaisa ek hi hai is planet me. And all the best for future.
author: Aniket  Sharma

text:
Yo pehalwan..
sale kabhi kasrat karta hua nahi dikhta tab bhi pehalwan wali body pata nahi kaha se ban gayi. Tu hi ek banda tha jo cycle ke peeche bitha leta tha mujhe ğŸ˜†. Aur bata kya chal raha hai? olympics wagehra me jaega?
Ab to bandi bhi ban gayi, ab to life set. Tab bhi ek advice de raha hu, usko JEE de lene de bhai,  4-6 ghante babu shona karta rehta hai raat me ğŸ¤£.
Still, thanks for being a part of my IITK life. 
All the best.
author: Aniket  Sharma

text:
"Bhai intern tests 3 din me shuru ho rahe hai, bohot bacha hai " - Me
"Yo hota rahega, par ye movie important hai" - A Devil who took double major
The same was repeated 1 week and 10 days before intern session ğŸ˜‘. Kya dushmani thi bhai, sab tumhare jitne chaapu nahi hote ki baithe baithe Adobe hire kar rahi, aur tum dream 11 pe team bana rahe.
Bohot movies dekhi yaar sath me, good old days. Bahas bhi bohot ki ghanto tak bekar topics pe ğŸ¤£. Par tumne abhi tak apne fitness ka raaz nahi bataya ğŸ˜“.
Bola tha maine ki 1st slot me hi aaja, par as usual Chauchy kisi ki sunta kaha hai, aur karo man marzi ğŸ™ƒ.
Still, thanks for being an integral part of my IITK journey. All the best ki to tumhe jarurat nahi, chaapu to pehle se hi ho.
PS: ab jab college khule to 1st slot hi lena !
author: Aniket  Sharma

text:
I dont expect ki tum koi memoir ki ummed rakh rahe hoga, given the fact ki 5 saal aur yaha rehna hai. And I dont doubt ki tab bhi antaragini wale Rs200 tumhari jeb me hi honge, *Koi bhao nahi degi*. On a serious tone, now IITs culture restoration depends on you, nahi kiya to vahi senior banke 1st year wali ragging karenge, yaad hai na ğŸ˜. Baki to tum help kar hi dete the aur befizul ka gyan pel hi dete the uske kya kehne(par kam hi bole to accha hai). 
thanks for being a supporting friend in needy times, and all the best for the remaining time in IITK and beyond.
PS: Agli Antaragini me milenge, pass banwa diyo
author: Aniket  Sharma

text:

Baki senior class gift program me nasha mukti kendra khulwane ke liye senate ko pitch karna ho to bata dena.
Aur thank you, tune meri cycle bech nahi daali lol ğŸ˜›
